msContents.summary: Of debts of various people on behalf of taxes on their farm land, both in kind (grain, barley, grass or hay, vegetables) and in money

msItemStruct.note: The thirteen fragments that this manuscript comprises derive probably from at least two leaves of an account book; they are mounted in two frames, fragment (1) in one, and fragments (2)-(13) in the other

supportDesc.support: (1) 234 x 206 mm, (A) 26 lines, top right left margins, (B) 12 lines, all margins; (2) 110 x 60 mm, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) 8 lines, right margin; (3) 82 x 36 mm, (A) 8 lines, top margin, (B) 6 lines, top margin; (4) 51 x 38 mm, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 1 line, bottom margin; (5) 226 x 110 mm, (A) 24 lines, top (?) bottom left margins, (B) 22 lines, no margins; (6) 111 x 104 mm, (A) 10 lines, right bottom margins, (B) 8 lines, bottom left margins; (7) 19 x 20 mm, (A) 2 lines, right (?) margin, (B) blank; (8) 29 x 10 mm, (A) blank, (B) 2 lines, top (?) margin; (9) 28 x 7 mm, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank; (10) 41 x 6 mm, (A) blank, (B) 3 lines, top (?) margin; (11) 24 x 10 mm, (A) 1 line, top (?) margin, (B) 3 lines, no margins; (12) 17 x 11 mm, (A) blank, (B) 1 line, bottom (?) margin; (13) 15 x 9 mm, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
